articles.content: German luxury automotive group BMW plans to bring 25 new products in India this year as it looks to accelerate sales growth, leaving behind the worst of the coronavirus pandemic. The company, which o… [+2218 chars]

articles.title: Asian Paints Q3 profit jumps 62% to Rs 1,238 crore, revenue grows 25% on festive demand - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Asian Paints shares rallied 39 percent during the quarter ended December 2020 and surged 53 percent in calendar year 2020.
articles.content: Asian Paints registered a massive 62 percent year-on-year growth in consolidated profit at Rs 1,238.3 crore for the quarter ended December 2020, aided by strong volume growth amid festive season and … [+2117 chars]
